verses.verse: Then Jonah <S%H3124><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> out of the fish <S%H1710><s%>'s belly <S%H4578><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%>, I cried <S%H7121><s%> by reason of my affliction <S%H6869><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H990><s%>; out of the belly of hell <S%H7585><s%> cried <S%H7768><s%> I <S%H8085><s%>, and you heard my voice <S%H6963><s%>.

For you had cast <S%H7993><s%> me into the deep <S%H4688><s%>, in the midst <S%H3824><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>; and the floods <S%H5104><s%> surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me about <S%H4867><s%>: all your billows and your waves <S%H1530><s%> passed over me <S%H5674><s%>.
Then I said <S%H559><s%>, I am cast out <S%H1644><s%> of your sight <S%H5869><s%>; yet I will look <S%H5027><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> toward your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.

The waters <S%H4325><s%> surrounded me about <S%H661><s%>, even to the soul <S%H5315><s%>: the depth <S%H8415><s%> closed me round about <S%H5437><s%>, the weeds <S%H5488><s%> were wrapped about <S%H2280><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%>.

I went down <S%H3381><s%> to the bottoms <S%H7095><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; the earth <S%H776><s%> with her bars <S%H1280><s%> was about me for ever <S%H5769><s%>: yet have you brought up <S%H5927><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> from corruption <S%H7845><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>.

When my soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted <S%H5848><s%> inside me I remembered <S%H2142><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and my prayer <S%H8605><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> unto you <S%H6944><s%>, into your holy temple <S%H1964><s%>.
They that observe <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities <S%H1892><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> their own mercy <S%H2617><s%>.

But I will sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto you with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>; I will pay <S%H7999><s%> that that I have vowed <S%H5087><s%>. Salvation <S%H3444><s%> is of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto the fish <S%H1709><s%>, and it vomited out <S%H6958><s%> Jonah <S%H3124><s%> upon the dry land <S%H3004><s%>.
